overview_of_class: This course offers a broad overview of issues related to how and why people invent, develop, use, adapt, or contest scientific knowledge and technology.
name: Topics in Science and Technology Studies
title: DOHA INTERDIS 242-0-70 Topics in Science and Technology Studies
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: NUQ: Seats are reserved for Sophomore and Freshmen only.

descriptions.value: This course offers a broad overview of issues related to how and why people invent, develop, use, adapt, or contest scientific knowledge and technology.

subject: INTERDIS
